title: The Office Boy
description: Having recently graduated from an elite academic college, Christopher is excited to land his dream job with an international business consultant. His boss is a no-nonsense South African, ex-military, respected and feared by everyone - they have been sent to Doha on an important project. Christopher soon learns that in the high pressure world of big business there is only one way to really unwind. From the boardroom to the bedroom, Christopher quickly discovers that to make it big you have got to work hard and be prepared for absolutely anything.
author: Gareth Johnson
